response.overview: Witness the wonders of Mexico -- from its ancient treasures and traditions to its stunning scenery -- in this travelogue hosted by archaeologist-anthropologist Dr. Dwayne L. Merry. Fascinating footage captures the amazing cliff divers of Acapulco, the mysterious Yucat√°n jungle, the beauty and pageantry of Mexican festivals, craftsmen at work and more. You'll even get an exclusive peek at the treasures kept in Mexico City's Museum of Anthropology.
response.title: Mexico: Dr. Merry's Nomad Travel
